dict.string: Screen Time Rewards uses Family Controls to monitor app usage and reward productive screen time activities. This helps parents track their children's educational app usage and manage screen time rewards.
Screen Time Rewards needs access to Screen Time data to track app usage and calculate reward points for educational activities. This data remains private and is used only for the reward system.
Screen Time Rewards sends notifications to remind you about rewards, celebrate achievements, and provide updates about your family's screen time goals.
